description: Fessenheim on the Rhine provided thousands of jobs but activists had long called for it to close.
title: France's oldest nuclear plant Fessenheim shuts down
title_page: France's oldest nuclear plant Fessenheim shuts down - BBC News
maintext: Fessenheim's first reactor was shut down in February and its second reactor was switched off at 23:00 (21:00 GMT) on Monday. Over the next three years the spent fuel will be removed and then it will take another 15 years to dismantle the plant entirely.
